"Located along Lorong Hang Jebat, Malacca, just steps from Jonker Street and the Melaka River, Hard Rock Cafe Melaka brings together great food, music, and culture in the heart of Melaka’s UNESCO World Heritage City. The cafe serves legendary American flavors, including world-famous burgers, juicy steaks, and handcrafted cocktails made with ingredients from halal-certified suppliers. Guests can explore unique music memorabilia from iconic artists and shop for exclusive Rock Shop® merchandise, perfect for collectors and gifts. Regular live music performances create a lively atmosphere, making this one of the top restaurants for travelers and locals to enjoy."
